----------------------------------------------------------------------------

There is no time to meet, sisters Jenny (Tammy Blanchard) and Lucy (Mira Sorvino) almost have nothing in common - in fact, Lucy is everything that Jenny repudiates in a person. About to marry a longtime love, Jenny gets a nasty visit from Lucy, who is about to have a nervous breakdown. Years ago, Jenny decided it was time to move away from his troubled family and live his life in peace and order. The unexpected visit has varying effects on the lives of Jenny, who finds himself living a happy time while shaken in preparations for the wedding and now is forced to reconnect with Lucy, who needs the help of sister to rebuild. Gradually the memories of the past and the present collide lull while the sisters value their lives.
